title: Poppy Grower

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Faction members from a faction that opposes Town or Clocktower do not know who each other are upon game start. There will be no factional chats for these factions.
Upon death, such factions that would normally know the members of the faction gain knowledge of the other members' identities. Factions that would normally have factional chat gain factional chat. If roleblocked while killed, these factions do not gain knowledge of other faction members or gain factional chats.

desc:
Post 4273
*In the hidden groves of the deep forest, the black poppy dwells. To see its revelry is to be enchanted. To smell its thick aroma is to be lost forever, a slave to the gods of light and dark.*
